Siref:On that, were almost the same because we have just arrived here 
and the preds too.We have a couple of them in jail now.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Scryed --
> 
> The black and red bot smiles again, "I'm fire support specialist. 
> Backing up my friends and allies in battle and otherwise. I haven't 
> seen battle, or friends in a long while however. Heh." She laughs 
> softly to herself.
> 
> "So, when did you arrive here?" Ask Scryed, interested to know more 
> about those who she will be working and coexisting with.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> > Siref smiled at Scryed "Heh, you'll be ok...I'm Siref, front 
> infantry 
> > unit, pleased to meet ya!" he said while putting his gun back.
> >
